short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate alt text for images like a magician.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AltMagick is a simple, easy-to-use browser extension that lets you right-click on any image and get alt text to copy and paste.
Use it on your websites (WordPress, Webflow, ...) or on your social networks to improve SEO, avoid lawsuits and enhance accessibility.
